title: Language Learning Design for Realizing PCK Framework and Social Justice in Emergency Online Teaching (EOT)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning in BYOD environments to improve language proficiency and promote socio-emotional engagement among professionals (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement language learning activities based on the PCK framework by forming a collaborative online community of practice.
Learners can apply language utilization strategies for socio-affective problem-solving in emergency online environments through self-directed learning.
Learners can complete a digital portfolio reflecting language learning outcomes and social participation experiences through integrated assessment methods.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
